glosses: To understand, to comprehend, to get.

examples.translation: I couldn't explain at all, they didn't understand at all.

glosses: To find something correct and appropriate.
To sense or predict someone's feelings or thoughts.
To benefit from, to gain advantage from something, to have a worthwhile or meaningful experience from.

examples.text: Bu şimdi izlediğimiz filmeden bi bok anlamadım, çok sıkıcı.
examples.translation: I haven't gotten anything out of this movie we're watching now; it's so boring.

examples.text: Şimdi buluşursak hiçbir şey anlamayız, yalnız 15 dakika görüşebileceğiz.
examples.translation: If we meet now, we won't get anything out of it; we'll only be able to spend 15 minutes together.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish آكلامق (añlamak, “to understand, to comprehend”), from Proto-Turkic *āŋla- (“to understand”), from Proto-Turkic *āŋ (“intelligence, ability to understand”). Cognate with Salar añna.
